revised_title: Obituary Notices of Fellows Deceased: William Allen, William Cureton, and Joseph Henry Green
tldr: This article provides obituary notices for three notable individuals in the fields of science and medicine: Capt. William Allen, a geographer and explorer; the Rev. Dr. William Cureton, a Syriac scholar and expert in ancient literature; and Joseph Henry Green, a prominent surgeon and anatomist. Each of these individuals made significant contributions to their respective fields, and their lives and work are remembered and celebrated in this piece.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > Biographies
